backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining profile, like, match, and chat models with comparison helpers plus profile creation logic and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Flat JSON-style file summarizing all major frontend components, screens, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying PlayPal.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with PWA configuration, meta tags, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Production service worker implementing versioned caching, precache strategy, and network-first logic for API calls.
frontend/scripts/mainnet-redeploy.sh: Shell script that reinstalls deps, builds the frontend, verifies files, and redeploys canisters to mainnet.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls authentication flow, showing login, profile setup, loading, or the main app shell based on identity and user profile state.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Manages navigation between main screens, handles chat and match profile transitions, and displays message notification badges.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessageBubbl: Renders a single chat message with styling based on sender and displays its timestamp.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Displays a user's profile card with photo, level, details, availability, and stats.
Provides UI controls for filtering discover results by level range and geographic zone.
frontend/src/components/InlineSheetError: Catches render errors in sheet content and shows a retry/close error UI instead of crashing the app.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Shows up to five stars representing a user's numeric level.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles profile photo selection, validation, upload, and progress display.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user photo if available or a fallback icon avatar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageNotificatio: Implements polling and local storage–based tracking of unread chat messages, showing notifications and sender info as needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, photos, matches, chat interactions, and candidate discovery using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/screens/ChatScreen.tsx: Renders a chat interface with message fetching, sending, auto‑scrolling, and recipient profile display.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Displays swipe‑style candidate discovery with filters, liking/passing, and UI state management.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form UI for editing an existing profile, handling state, validation, and submitting updates via useUpdateProfile.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays the login screen with branding and buttons to sign in or create an account using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Shows the user's matches list and loads each matched user's profile, allowing navigation to chat or profile detail.
Loads and displays another user's profile with handling for loading, errors, and navigation back.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows the logged‑in user's profile with stats and allows switching to an edit mode to update details.
Initial profile creation form that collects user info and submits it via useCreateProfile.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders the settings screen with logout functionality and an about section, clearing identity and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/utils/discoverFilterMapping: Provides conversions between Level enum values and stable string keys for use in UI filters.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Maps Level and Position enums to numbers or Spanish labels and back for profile handling.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Manages unread message state per user in localStorage, including loading, saving, and clearing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing known issues, requested fixes, and feature definitions for resolving a white‑screen crash in Discover filters.
